nodes.text: The Elshandruu system was a star system in the Outer Rim's Quence sector. It contained the planet of Elshandruu Pica.
During the Galactic Civil War, Imperial Captain Sair Yonka and the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Avarice went to the Elshandruu system and fought the pirates in the asteroid belt.
In 11 ABY, the Errant Venture was stationed in the system.
